metrics.name: Number of systems in analysis
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(DISTINCT "kpiIns_ID")

metrics.name: Completion Score
metrics.signalFragment: AVG(CASE WHEN "COMPLETION_CNT" = 'TRUE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100

metrics.name: Production order components without material
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Production order components without material") * 100

metrics.name: Production order components marked for deletion
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Production order components marked for deletion") * 100

metrics.name: Production order not yet released for components
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Production order not yet released for components") * 100

metrics.name: Open production order components with partial withdrawal
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Open production order components with partial withdrawal") * 100

metrics.name: Open production order components with planned requirements date in the past
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Open production order components with planned requirements date in the past") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase requisition items deleted
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Purchase requisition items deleted") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase requisition items waiting for approval
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Purchase requisition items waiting for approval") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase requisition items approved
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Purchase requisition items approved") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase requisition items rejected
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Purchase requisition items rejected") * 100

metrics.name: Open purchase requisition items with delivery date in the past
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Open purchase requisition items with delivery date in the past") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase order quantity greater than purchase requisition quantity
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Purchase order quantity greater than purchase requisition quantity") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase order quantity less than purchase requisition quantity
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Purchase order quantity less than purchase requisition quantity") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase order items with different delivery date than in purchase requisition
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Purchase order items with different delivery date than in purchase requisition") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase order items exist although production order is not yet released
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Purchase order items exist although production order is not yet released") * 100

metrics.name: Open purchase order items exist although production order is technically completed
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Open purchase order items exist although production order is technically completed") * 100

metrics.name: Goods receipt earlier than planned requirements date
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Goods receipt earlier than planned requirements date") * 100

metrics.name: Goods receipt later than planned requirements date
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Goods receipt later than planned requirements date") * 100

metrics.name: Components with withdrawal quantity greater than planned
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Components with withdrawal quantity greater than planned") * 100

metrics.name: Components with final issue indicator and withdrawal quantity less than planned
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Components with final issue indicator and withdrawal quantity less than planned") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase requisition items created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Purchase requisition items created") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase requisition items created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Purchase requisition items created")

metrics.name: Purchase order items created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Purchase order items created") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase order items created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Purchase order items created")

metrics.name: Goods receipt posted for purchase order items (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Goods receipt posted for purchase order items") * 100

metrics.name: Goods receipt posted for purchase order items (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Goods receipt posted for purchase order items")

metrics.name: Create production order non-stock component
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create production order non-stock component')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create purchase requisition item automatically when saving production order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create purchase requisition item automatically when saving production order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Approve purchase requisition item
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Approve purchase requisition item')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Release purchase requisition item without approval
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Release purchase requisition item without approval')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Release purchase requisition item - others
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Release purchase requisition item - others')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Convert purchase requisition item into purchase order item
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Convert purchase requisition item into purchase order item')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Post goods receipt for purchase order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Post goods receipt for purchase order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100
